mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_LOG(LOG_ID, USER_CODE, USER_NAME, MODULE,ACTION,OPT_DATE, CLIENT_IP, METHOD, PARAMS, OPT_DESC,LEGAL_ORG, CRT_USER_CODE, CRT_ORG_CODE, CRT_DATE) VALUES (#{logId}, #{userCode}, #{userName}, #{module},#{action},#{optDate}, #{clientIp},#{method} ,#{params},#{optDesc}, #{legalOrg},#{crtUserCode}, #{crtOrgCode}, #{crtDate})
mapper.select: select ORG_CODE,ORG_NAME,ORG_LEVEL from SYS_ORG where PARENT_ORG_CODE=#{_parameter}
select P.ORG_CODE,P.ORG_NAME,P.ORG_LEVEL from SYS_ORG P,SYS_ORG O where P.ORG_CODE=O.PARENT_ORG_CODE AND O.ORG_CODE=#{_parameter}
select ORG_CODE,ORG_NAME,ORG_LEVEL from SYS_ORG where ORG_CODE=#{_parameter}

SELECT DISTINCT M.MENU_CODE AS code, IFNULL(I.MENU_LABEL, M.MENU_NAME) AS label, MENU_URL AS name, MENU_TYPE AS type, MENU_ICON AS icon, MENU_SEQ AS seq FROM SYS_MENU M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MENU_CODE, MENU_LABEL, MENU_TIP FROM SYS_MENU_I18N WHERE IS_START = '1' AND LANGUAGE = IFNULL(#{language},'zh') AND COUNTRY = IFNULL(#{country},'CN') ) I ON M.MENU_CODE = I.MENU_CODE, SYS_USER_ROLE UR, SYS_AUTHORIZE A WHERE M.IS_START='1' AND M.MENU_CODE = A.RESOURCE_ID AND A.ROLE_CODE = UR.ROLE_CODE AND UR.USER_CODE = #{userCode} AND M.PARENT_CODE = #{parentId} ORDER BY MENU_SEQ

SELECT MIN(A.DATA_AUTH_TYPE) AS DATA_AUTH FROM SYS_MENU M, SYS_AUTHORIZE A, SYS_ROLE R,SYS_USER_ROLE UR WHERE A.RESOURCE_ID = M.MENU_CODE AND A.ROLE_CODE = R.ROLE_CODE AND R.ROLE_CODE=UR.ROLE_CODE AND M.MENU_URL = #{url} AND UR.USER_CODE=#{userCode}
SELECT password FROM SYS_USER WHERE USER_CODE=#{username}
